reviewsJson.markdown:
**Setup**: Geekvape Ammit 26ga ni80 @.54ohms 

**Percentage**: 3%

**Steeped**: SnV and 7 days

Honestly this is just a really good base. I don't know what else I can say. Nothing magical about it, altho this is definitely worlds better than the rest of the coffee flavours I've tried. It's just a nice full bodied base that has just the right nose. Nothing as full bodied as a cup of Italian Espresso, more like an americano's smell. 

It's good. I can see it paired with stuff like other coffees, creams maybe or some drink attempts. I am no mixologist nor am I into creamy vapes so just coupling it with other coffees. 

**Verdict**: 10/10 for the accurate coffee feel. As a single flavour tho I found it boring after 5 minutes and wouldn't continue like that.

Complimentary recipe:

3% VTA Coffee Base

2% VTA Arabica Coffee

1% VTA Strawberry Milk
reviewsJson.author: RoninVX
reviewsJson.title: Coffee Base
